title: Medium parser
description: Unlocks the whole medium article on the go.
author: Xatta Trone
detailDescription:
Read the medium membership articles for free!

Medium parser is a web browser extension to help read the member-only articles on medium.com from google web cache / archive.is

This tool helps you overcome the 3 article/month limit on medium.com and allows you to read unlimited articles.

The extension now supports identifying articles of external publishers and suggesting the link to read full content with the help of a Google search.

✅Checkout my other extensions: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/user/16801663/
